metadata.inclusion:
* Please proceed with the door lock open
* To add or include the CDL-107U into a Z-Wave network
1. Set the controller in inclusion mode.
2. Press the [R] button for 6 seconds.
3. Press the [1][4][7] button after pressing the [R] button.
metadata.exclusion:
* Please proceed with the door lock open
* To remove or exclude the CDL-107U into a Z-Wave network
1. Set the controller in exclusion mode.
2. Press the [R] button for 6 seconds.
3. Press the [3][6][9] button after pressing the [R] button.
metadata.reset:
* To Factory Reset

Please use this procedure only when the primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.

1. Press the [R] button for 9 seconds

2. Press the [1][2][3][6][5][4][7] button after pressing the [R] button
